member.name: M:MGroup.FEM.ConvectionDiffusion.Isoparametric.ConvectionDiffusionElement2D.BuildShapeFunctionMatrix(System.Double[])
member.summary: The shape function matrix is 1-by-n, where n = is the number of shape functions.

member.name: T:MGroup.FEM.ConvectionDiffusion.Line.ConvectionDiffusionRod
member.summary: ConvectionDiffusion element for unknown variable's transfer along a single direction. Can be used for 1D, 2D and 3D problems. Does not take into account geometric non-linearities. Authors: Orestis Papas, Christodoulou Theofilos.
